system.description: You can create wondrous items, a category that includes magic jewelry, tools, books, clothing, and much more.
system.benefit:
You can create a wide variety of magic items. Crafting a wondrous item takes one day for each 1,000 gp in its price. To create a wondrous item, you must use up raw materials costing half of its base price. See the magic item creation rules in Chapter 7 for more information.

You can also mend a broken wondrous item if it is one that you could make. Doing so costs half the raw materials and half the XP it would take to craft that item in the first place.
